text: Amazing dishes and nice ambience. The service is great and the noodle dish I had was very fresh. I will make sure to stop by when I visit canda again.  Asian dishes at its best..
Excellent repas pris à ce restaurant. Service rapide et menu attrayant. Comme dans plusieurs restaurants cependant, le bruit est assez élevé....
Beau resto avec images d'Angkor sur les murs, bonne bouff, excellent service
